definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :1Ki 21:8 noble, late, esp. Neh., v. Dr:Intr 519 n. (v. Lag:BN 32)—only pl. [[חׂרִים]] 1Ki 21:8 + 6 t., [[חוֹרִים]] Ec 10:17, Ne 6:17 + 3 t.; sf. [[חׂרֶיהָ]] Is 34:12; —nobles in Naboth's city 1Ki 21:8, 1Ki 21:11 nobles of Judah, [[חׂרֵי יְהוּדָה]] 1Ki 6:17, 1Ki 13:17, Je 27:20, Je 39:6, Ne 6:17, Ne 13:17, [[והסגנים]] ´[[הח]] (in Jerusalem) Ne 2:16, Ne 4:8, Ne 4:13, Ne 5:7, Ne 7:5, Ec 10:17, of Edom Is 34:12.—I. [[חׂר]], v. II. [[חור]].
